title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability for AI Agents and Traditional Workloads (COP335)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理和传统工作负载的可观测性 (COP335)
abstract: Modern applications combine AI agents with traditional software components, creating hybrid systems requiring unified monitoring. This session demonstrates using Amazon CloudWatch to observe your complete application stack—from AI agent decision-making and behavior patterns to traditional infrastructure metrics like CPU and memory usage. Learn practical techniques for tracking AI agent performance alongside existing application monitoring, correlating issues between AI components and traditional services, and using Amazon CloudWatch's search capabilities to identify problems quickly. We'll show how customers use Amazon CloudWatch Application Signals to maintain reliability when AI agents interact with conventional workloads, streamlining troubleshooting across hybrid environments.
abstract_cn: 现代应用程序将AI代理与传统软件组件相结合，创建需要统一监控的混合系统。本次会议演示如何使用Amazon CloudWatch观察完整的应用程序堆栈——从AI代理决策和行为模式到传统基础设施指标（如CPU和内存使用率）。学习实用技术，在现有应用程序监控的同时跟踪AI代理性能，关联AI组件与传统服务之间的问题，并使用Amazon CloudWatch的搜索功能快速识别问题。我们将展示客户如何使用Amazon CloudWatch Application Signals在AI代理与常规工作负载交互时保持可靠性，简化混合环境中的故障排除。
